description:
Thanks to an accident with one of Kululu`s inventions, Fuyuki and the frogs time slip back to the 1980s.  There, he meets his mom as a middle-schooler!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Flux Capacitor? I Hardly Flux Ca-Know It-Her!
Fuyuki 198X Bokutachi no Natsuyasumi de Arimasu
Nos vacances d`été d`il y a 20 ans
冬樹 198X・僕たちの夏休み であります
